DOC.criteria: The volunteer older 19 year , nonobese ( body mass index , BMI le 27 kg/m2 ) , normolipidemic ( fast serum concentration triglyceride < 140 mg/dL total cholesterol < 200 mg/dL ) nonsmoker . The following exclusion criterion apply : medication within two week prior start study , regular alcohol consumption > 40 g/d , acute inflammatory disease define serum Creactive protein > 1 mg/dL , abnormality screen visit laboratory test consider clinically relevant , family history diabetes mellitus dyslipidemia , glucose intolerance , allergy hypersensitivity study medication , blood clotting disorder .
